name: IWF [Weird & Funny Edition]
description:
Hi, there! This Russian version is a joint effort of the four of us:

Olga Kirillova (Telegram): game translator from Ufa. Fancies playing games and aims to make games more approachable and accessible by translating and adapting them to other cultures.

Olga Kuznetsova (LinkedIn): IT marketing translator and editor from St. Petersburg, enjoys playing NFS and hidden object games

Veronika Shilenok (e-mail): freelance English>Russian translator from Vyborg with a big passion for languages and gaming

Anastasiya Tarapyhina (LinkedIn): translator and language support specialist from St. Petersburg working with four languages (Russian, Belarusian, English, German)

We hope you'll like it.

Cheers and have fun
